column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////With all the buzz
column2: T was time to try Common Bond. It fully lived up to its advance billing. I went for a mid-afternoon snack
column3: and had a kugelhopf and a salted caramel macaron. They both were tremendously good and filled the bill. Common Bond's premium product has its price
column4: but it is worth every penny.
